transArray.content: Quiet, comfortable, and a good living environment! The service staff are warm and polite, the service is in place, the rooms are neat and clean, and the breakfast is rich. It is a very suitable place to stay for a business trip. give it a like!

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for your recognition of the hotel's environment and services. Your satisfaction is the driving force for our progress. Thank you very much for your review and support. The hotel's breakfast time is from 7:00 to 11:00, Chinese and Western The buffet breakfast has a variety of varieties, is nutritious and delicious, freshly cooked noodles, hot noodles and small pastries satisfy your special delicacies without leaving home. The hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the Fourth Ring Road, and shares a parking space with the park, with ample parking spaces. , you only need to pick up the electronic parking coupon at the front desk when leaving the hotel to park for free. Public transportation is accessible in all directions around the hotel, making it the best choice for your business trip and accommodation. All the hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you success in your work! General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
